description: Unique global effect:<bulletlist><bullet>+100 <relations></relations> <hyperlink>Relations</hyperlink> with <freecity></freecity> <hyperlink>Free Cities</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Rulers></hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Rainbow Clover
lore: `The Rainbow Clover, when lending in its scintillating aspec to any setting, has been found to promote feelings of camraderie and fellowship among those who gaze upon it. Once a notable feature of many Halfling tribes' feasts and mead halls.'
author: Ham Binger, Mead and Meadows: A Halfling's Guide to Merrymaking

description: Unique global effect:<bulletlist><bullet><whisperingstone></whisperingstone> <hyperlink>Whispering Stones</hyperlink> grant +1 <allegiance></allegiance> <hyperlink>Allegiance</hyperlink></bullet></bulletlist>
name: SilverTongue Fruit
lore: `An enchanting bloom that, upon consumption, encourages cooperation in those who indulge in its succulent harvest. Often used as a treat during negatiations, to bring about a fruitful outcome to all.'
author: Julia of House Inioch, Personal Journal from the First Age

description: Unique global effect:<bulletlist><bullet>Founding, migrating, and absorbing <hyperlink>Cities</hyperlink> takes -2 turns</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Haste Berries
lore: `The fruit of the Hasteberry bush grows in the blink of an eye, with a popping sound that almost sounds like music. Those who ave consumed the fruit speak of a fizzing sensation and a zesty, tangy taste, as well as of their limbs immediately becoming lighter.'
author: Roderick Finwing, Local Flora and its Applications: Part I, Medicine and Physical Enhancement

description: Unique global effect:<bulletlist><bullet>Researching Sells costs -10% less <knowledge></knowledge> <hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink></bullet></bulletlist>
name: Tranquility Pool
lore: `Rare wonders in the world, these pools are said to be the liquifaction of the collective wisdom of the people who have walked the land. Those who spend time gazing into their tranquil waters experience clarity of thought like never before.'
author: Larissa Mirablilis, Myth and Truth: Flklore and its Arcane Origins

description: Unique global effect:<bulletlist><bullet>+20 <caststrategic></caststrategic><hyperlink>World Map Casting Points.</hyperlink></bullet></bulletlist>
name: Astral Dew
lore: `In places where the natural realms and the Astral Sea converge, certain types of flora become infused with arcane properties as they are naturally more suceptible. The dew from this flora is highly sought after by practitioners of magic, as it can act as a catalyst for both spells and research into many kinds of arcana.'
author: Edward Portsmith, Advanced Reports onf Mana INfusion

description: Unique global effect:<bulletlist><bullet>+20 <casttactical></casttactical><hyperlink>Combat Casting Points.</hyperlink></bullet></bulletlist>
name: Archon Blood
lore: `When the mighty and enigmatic Archons fell in ages past, their blood infused and changed the land in certain places. Now, travelers often report feeling strangely invigorated when crossing this hallowed ground. The mysterious substance found therin can be carefully cultivated and gathered as raw magical power.'
author: Uncredited Scholar, Remnants of the Archon: Part II

description: Unique global effect:<bulletlist><bullet><hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> cost 20% less <unitprod></unitprod> <hyperlink>Draft</hyperlink></bullet></bulletlist>
name: Fireforge Stone
lore: `Fireforge Stones are said to be the remnants of a volcano's heart. They emanate heat eternally, resisting all attempts to quench their warmth. Weapons can be more efficiently forged when using the magically enhanced temperature of these stones.'
author: Fangir Rockborne, Journals from the Second Age: Part I

description: Unique global effect:<bulletlist><bullet><hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> gain +10% <xp></xp> <hyperlink>Experience</hyperlink></bullet></bulletlist>
name: Focus Crystals
lore: `When a geode of crystallized astral essence forms above ground and is touched by starlight, it splits like and earthen, blooming plant. The newly exposed, glistening crystal within is highly magical and infuses its bearers with arcane power.'
author: Edward Portsmith, Advanced Reports on Mana Infusion

description: Unique global effect:<bulletlist><bullet>Hurry Recruitment for <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> is 25% cheaper.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Arcanium Ore
lore: `When the ancient Titans shaped the world, their sweat would drip onto the priaml materials of the earth, fusing the two together into raw Arcanium. Nowe whenever a vein is exposed above ground, a strange, ethereal vapor sees prospectors from all over rushing to its location. Its unique composition makes for magical and malleable metal, meaing far quicker production times!'
author: Fangir Rockborne, Journals from the Second Age: Part II

description: When annexed:<bulletlist><bullet>Counts as a <forester></forester>Forester +5<influence></influence> +15<food></food> +15<production></production> -5<happiness></happiness>.</bullet><bullet>+2<mana></mana> Mana and +2<research></research>Knowledge per <forester></forester> Forester in City Domain</bullet></bulletlist>
name: World Tree

description: When annexed:<bulletlist><bullet>Counts as a <conduit></conduit>Conduit +5<influence></influence> +25<mana></mana> -5<happiness></happiness>.</bullet><bullet>+2<research></research> Knowledge per <researchpost></researchpost> Research Post in City Domain</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Secret Temple

description: When annexed:<bulletlist><bullet>Counts as a <mine></mine>Mine +5<influence></influence> +15<unitprod></unitprod>+10<gold></gold> -5<happiness></happiness>.</bullet><bullet>Units cost -25% <gold></gold> Gold to recruit.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Magma Forge

description: When annexed:<bulletlist><bullet>Counts as a <conduit></conduit>Conduit +5<influence></influence> +15<mana></mana>+15<research></research> -5<happiness></happiness>.</bullet><bullet>Enemies cannot target World Map Spells in this Domain.</bullet><bullet>Enemies cannot cast Spells in Combat in Domain.</bullet><bullet>Wizard's Bombardment Siege Project, which can speed up a Siege using <mana></mana>.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Lost Wizard Tower

description: When annexed:<bulletlist><bullet>Counts as a <researchpost></researchpost>Research Post +5<influence></influence> +25<research></research> -5<happiness></happiness>.</bullet><bullet>+2 <mana></mana> Mana, +2 <research></research> Knowledge, and +1 <soul></soul> Soul(if obtainable) for each Hero in Crypt.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Lost Tomb

description: When annexed:<bulletlist><bullet>Counts as a <farm></farm>Farm +5<influence></influence> +20<food></food> -5<happiness></happiness>.</bullet><bullet>+2 <happiness></happiness> City Stability per <fishery></fishery> Fishery, <farm></farm> Farm and <forester></forester> Forester in City Domain</bullet><bullet>Friendly Units in Domain are healed for 30 <hp></hp> Hit Points at the end of earch strategic <turn></turn> Turn.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Hidden Wellspring

description: When annexed:<bulletlist><bullet>Counts as a <mine></mine>Mine +5<influence></influence> +30<gold></gold> -5<happiness></happiness>.</bullet><bullet>Magic Origin Units require -50% less Unit Upkeep in this City Domain.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Golden Ziggurat

description: When annexed:<bulletlist><bullet>Counts as a <conduit></conduit>Conduit +5<influence></influence> +20<mana></mana> -5<happiness></happiness>.</bullet><bullet>+2 <mana></mana> Mana per <conduit></conduit> Conduit in City domain.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Crystal Forest

description: When annexed:<bulletlist><bullet>Counts as a <researchpost></researchpost>Research Post +5<influence></influence> +20<research></research> -5<happiness></happiness>.</bullet><bullet>+5 <garrison></garrison> Fortification Health per <quarry></quarry> Quarry in City Domain.</bullet><bullet>Can be set as a Unit deploy location.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Castle Ruins

description: When annexed:<bulletlist><bullet>Counts as a <quarry></quarry>Quarry +5<influence></influence> +20<production></production> -5<happiness></happiness>.</bullet><bullet>+2 <mana></mana> Mana per <quarry></quarry> Quarry in City Domain.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Ancient Cave

description: When annexed:<bulletlist><bullet>Counts as a <researchpost></researchpost>Research Post +5<influence></influence> +20<research></research> -5<happiness></happiness>.</bullet><bullet>Unlocks "Crack the Vault", a single-us action which trades 500 <mana></mana> Mana for 500 <knowledge></knowledge> Knowledge.</bullet><bullet>Unlocks the Summon Progenitor Golem combat spell</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Vaultsphere
